title: Get one indicated slice and its containing IDs (LLMEC internally-used ID)
name: GetSliceByID

title: Get all the slices and its containing IDs (LLMEC internally-used ID)
name: GetSlices

title: Get all the traffic flow statistic.
name: GetFlows

title: Get the traffic flow statistic by ID. [Default]
name: GetFlowsByID

title: Get the traffic flow statistic by ID. [Default]
name: GetFlowsByID

name: GetFlowsByIMSIandBearerID

title: Add default/dedicated bearer context.
name: AddBearer

Parameter.description: EPS bearer ID
(optional) Slice ID. default = 0
(optional) Type of service includeing DSCP and ECN. default = 0
IMSI
S1 downlink tunnel ID
S1 uplink tunnel ID
IP address of UE
IP address of eNodeB

title: Remove one specific bearer context [Default].
name: DeleteBearer

Parameter.description: ID of the bearer (LLMEC internally used to identify every single bearer, which is different from EPS bearer ID)

title: Remove one specific bearer context by LLMEC internally-used bearer ID.
name: DeleteBearerByID

Parameter.description: ID of the bearer (LLMEC internally used to identify every single bearer, which is different from EPS bearer ID)

title: Remove one specific bearer context by its IMSI and EPS bearer ID.
name: DeleteBearerByIMSIandBearerID

Parameter.description: IMSI and EPS bearer ID are concatenated by comma to from an indentity of bearer, e.g. 208950000000009,1

title: Remove all bearers context.
name: DeleteBearers

title: Get one specific bearer context By LLMEC-internally used bearer ID.
name: GetBearerByID

Parameter.description: ID of the bearer (LLMEC internally used to identify every single bearer, which is different from EPS bearer ID)

name: GetBearerByID

Parameter.description: ID of the bearer (LLMEC internally used to identify every single bearer, which is different from EPS bearer ID)

title: Get one specific bearer context by IMSI and EPS Bearer ID.
name: GetBearerByIMSIandBearerID

Parameter.description: IMSI and EPS bearer ID are concatenated by comma to from an indentity of bearer, e.g. 208950000000009,1

title: Get all bearer context.
name: GetBearers

title: Redirect specific traffic flow for one bearer. [Default]
name: RedirectBearer

Parameter.description: (optional) Type of service includeing DSCP and ECN. default = 0
where the to-be-redirected traffic is coming from
where the to-be-redirected traffic is going to
ID of the bearer (LLMEC internally used to identify every single bearer, which is different from EPS bearer ID)

title: Redirect specific traffic flow for one bearer.
name: RedirectBearerByID

Parameter.description: (optional) Type of service includeing DSCP and ECN. default = 0
where the to-be-redirected traffic is coming from
where the to-be-redirected traffic is going to
ID of the bearer (LLMEC internally used to identify every single bearer, which is different from EPS bearer ID)

title: Redirect specific traffic flow for one bearer by IMSI and EPS bearer ID.
name: RedirectBearerByIMSIandBearerID

Parameter.description: (optional) Type of service includeing DSCP and ECN. default = 0
where the to-be-redirected traffic is coming from
where the to-be-redirected traffic is going to
ID of the bearer (LLMEC internally used to identify every single bearer, which is different from EPS bearer ID)

title: Remove the redirect flow for one bearer. [Default]
name: RemoveRedirectBearer

Parameter.description: ID of the bearer (LLMEC internally used to identify every single bearer, which is different from EPS bearer ID)

title: Remove the redirect flow for one bearer by ID.
name: RemoveRedirectBearerByID

Parameter.description: ID of the bearer (LLMEC internally used to identify every single bearer, which is different from EPS bearer ID)

title: Remove the redirect flow for one bearer by IMSI and EPS bearer ID.
name: RemoveRedirectBearerByIMSIandBearerID

Parameter.description: ID of the bearer (LLMEC internally used to identify every single bearer, which is different from EPS bearer ID)

title: Get information of a service.
name: GetServiceID

Parameter.description: Service Instance Id.

title: Service availability query.
name: GetServices

Parameter.description: List of ser_instance_ids to query the availability of a list of ME service instances.
Category Id to query the availability of ME services.
Names of service to be queried.

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content: curl -X GET -G http://127.0.0.1:8888/mp1/v1/services -d ser_instance_id="serviceId1" -d ser_category_id="RNI1" -d ser_name="PLMN Infomation"

title: Create a service (new service registration).
name: PostServices

Parameter.description: (representing the general information of a ME service).

title: Update a ME service (service availability update).
name: PutServices

Parameter.description: ServiceInfo (representing the general information of a ME service).

title: Delete a subscription
name: DeleteApplicationSubscription

Parameter.description: Id of the ME application.
Id of the subscription.

title: Retrieve information about a subscription for one specific app instance
name: GetApplicationSubscription

Parameter.description: Id of the ME application.
Represents a subscription type to the notifications from the ME platform (AppTerminationNotificationSubscription or SerAvailabilityNotificationSubscription).
Id of the subscription.

title: Retrieve information about all subscriptions for one specific app instance
name: GetApplicationSubscriptions

Parameter.description: Id of the ME application.

title: Create a subscription
name: SubscribeApplicationSubscription

Parameter.description: Id of the ME application.
subscription to the ME service availability notifications.
subscription to the ME application termination notifications.

description: Ceate a new subscription to the ME service availability notifications (SerAvailabilityNotificationSubscription) or the ME application termination notifications (AppTerminationNotificationSubscription).

title: Delete a RabEst subscription
name: DeleteRabEstSubscription

Parameter.description: ID of the RabEstSubscription to be deleted.

title: Get PLMN information
name: GetPLMNInfo
description: Gets the information on Mobile Network(s) (PLMN info) associated with a specific application instance

Parameter.description: ME application instance's ID.

title: Get information of a RabEst subscription
name: GetRabEstSubscription

Parameter.description: ID of the RabEstSubscription.

title: Get a list of subscriptions for RabEstSubscription
name: GetRabEstSubscriptions

title: Create a subscription to RAB establishment notifications
name: SubscribeRabEstSubscription
description: Create a subscription to RAB establishment notifications from RNI Service

Parameter.description: (required) URL selected by the ME application to receive notifications on the subscribed RNIS information.
(required) (FilterCriteriaAssocQci) List of filtering criteria for the subscription
List of hyperlinks related to the resource
Time stamp

title: Update a subscription to RAB establishment notifications
name: UpdateRabEstSubscription

Parameter.description: (required) URL selected by the ME application to receive notifications on the subscribed RNIS information.
(required) (FilterCriteriaAssocQci) List of filtering criteria for the subscription
List of hyperlinks related to the resource
Time stamp
ID of the subscription
